snippet: A federal appeals court in San Francisco ruled that Electronic Arts must face legal claims by college players that it unfairly used their images without compensation.
abstract: San Francisco appeals court rules that video game maker Electronic Arts must face legal claims by college players that it unfairly used their images without compensation.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court in San Francisco ruled that Electronic Arts must face legal claims by college players that it unfairly used their images without compensation.

headline.main: Video Game Maker Electronic Arts Loses Ruling
